TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit CheckedListBox/CheckedIndexCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Encapsulates the collection of indexes of checked items (including items in an indeterminate state) in a .

span.span: Encapsulates the collection of indexes of checked items (including items in an indeterminate state) in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选中的索引集合是中的所有项的集合中的索引子集控件。The checked indexes collection is a subset of the indexes into the collection of all items in the control. 这些索引在选中或不确定状态中指定项。These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state. 下表是控件 （包含在控件中的所有项） 中的项的索引集合的示例。The following table is an example of the indexed collection of items in the control (all items contained in the control). |索引Index|项Item|检查状态Check State| |-----------|----------|-----------------| |00|对象 1object 1|| |11|对象 2object 2|| |22|对象 3object 3|| |33|对象 4object 4|| |44|对象 5object 5|| 根据前面的示例下, 表显示选中项的索引的索引的集合。Based on the previous example, the following table shows the indexed collection of indexes of checked items. |索引Index|项的索引Index of Item| |-----------|-------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| 类具有两个成员，可用于访问存储的索引，属性和方法。The class has two members that allow you to access the stored indexes, the property and the method. 在前面的示例中，调用基于参数值为 1 的属性返回 3 的值。Based on the previous example, a call to the property with a parameter value of 1 returns a value of 3. 调用3 的参数返回的值为 1。A call to with a parameter of 3 returns a value of 1. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举中的已选中的项若要查看内容检查项的状态处于。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 该示例演示如何使用方法来设置项的复选状态。The example demonstrates using the method to set the check state of an item. 该示例还演示了如何使用属性来获取，和属性来获取。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 第一个循环使用方法以获取的每个选中的项，给定项的索引。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二个循环也使用，但使用方法来检索项的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. [!code-cpp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CheckedListBox#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CheckedListBox/VB/source.vb#2)]
